Translations.Text: Ur twalav ara ixabiten, la qqaoen i watmaten nnsen ijehlen, seg wAt Tezmamt: "ma ssuff$en kwen, ard a neffe$ yidwen, ur nessemeas i yiwen, d awez$i, mgal nnwen. Ma nnu$en kwen, ar ad awen nefk afus". Ad Icehhed Oebbi, ar nitni d ikeddaben
Ma ssuff$en ten, ur teff$en yidsen. Ma nnu$en ten, ur asen ppaken afus. Ma aawnen ten, ad rewlen; ihi, ur ppaawanen
D kunwi, sennig Oebbi, ay ugaden idmaren nnsen, ayagi, acku nitni d agdud ur nefhim
Ur kwen pna$en, ddukwlen, siwa ma di temdinin ippwaeeoben, ne$ deffir leswao. Lbe$wv garasen qessee. A pxilev dduklen, wanag rwin wulawen nnsen. Ayagi, acku nitni d agdud ur nepxemmim
Cban wid i ten id izwaren s cwii kan, jeooben lwexda igiten nnsen, fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
Cban Cciian, mi s inna i umdan: "ejhel"! Mi ijhel, inna: "nek mgirrde$ k, nek ugade$ Oebbi, Mass imavalen
D times, ih, ara yilin d taggara nnsen, ad wekkoen dinna. Ayagi d arraz imednas
